[+1646] More Scientology Defectors Come Forward With Abuse Accounts
item.description: They are stepping forward — from Dallas and Denver, Portland, Las Vegas, Montana — talking about what happened, to them and their friends, during their years in the Church of Scientology.

item.title: [+1563] FBI Whistleblower: Bin Laden & Taliban Worked for US to 9/11
item.description: Edmonds expert fills in details from recent interview with noted, gagged FBI translator/whistleblower. In the interview, Sibel says that the US maintained 'intimate relations' with Bin Laden, and the Taliban, "all the way until that day of September 11."

[+1373] If Marijuana Was Legal, This Is How It Would Look
item.description: Recently, Print Magazine approached four design and packaging firms with a simple brief: If marijuana was legal, how could it be packaged? The following are the ideas and proposals that came from that brief. So… which one would you pick?

item.title: [+1328] The Ultimate Guide To Speeding Up Firefox 3.5
item.description: I like Firefox but it’s not as fast as it used to be. This is a comprehensive, safe guide to optimizing Firefox 3.5 for speedy browsing.

item.title: [+1261] Why The FCC Wants To Smash Open The iPhone
item.description: Right about now, Apple probably wishes it had never rejected Google Voice and related apps from the iPhone. Or maybe it was AT&T who rejected the apps. Nobody really knows. But the FCC launched an investigation last night to find out, sending letters to all three companies (Apple, AT&T, and Google)...

item.title: [+988] Apple Expects Google Voice App Developers To Pay Refunds
item.description: Now this is ridiculous. Not only did Apple pull all the unofficial Google Voice apps out of the App Store for an absurd reason, now they expect the developers of those apps to fund refunds out of their own pockets..

item.title: [+800] Masturbation: 5 Things Women Don't Know
item.description: Women's masturbation is not generally a common topic of conversation among girlfriends. Maybe it should be, say sex therapists. They point out that women's masturbation can have benefits both for health and relationships. Here are five things about masturbation women may not know:
